changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.coordinate_relationship ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule kind bigint NOT NULL, -- The kind of coordinate being related relationship bigint NOT NULL, -- The relationship between a query coordinate and those satisfying the query sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, -- The ordering of these relationship rules for a given CoordinateKind and Relationship subordinate_coordinate_kind bigint NOT NULL, -- The subordinate coordinate kind this rule deals with attribute bigint NOT NULL, -- The attribute of the subordinate coordinate kind this rule deals with attribute_relationship bigint NOT NULL, -- The relationship between this attribute of the query coordinate and those satisfying the query notes character varying, -- Usage notes for this rule research bigint, -- A research flag that has been set on an individual rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The Resource that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which this rule was last updated CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_attribute_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_kind_fkey FOREIGN KEY (kind) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate_kind (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_subordinate_coordinate_kind_fkey FOREIGN KEY (subordinate_coordinate_kind) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate_kind (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_relationship_kind_key UNIQUE (kind , relationship , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.coordinate_relationship IS 'Defines rules for relating coordinates'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.id IS 'Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.kind IS 'The kind of coordinate being related'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.relationship IS 'The relationship between a query coordinate and those satisfying the query'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.sequence_number IS 'The ordering of these relationship rules for a given CoordinateKind and Relationship'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.subordinate_coordinate_kind IS 'The subordinate coordinate kind this rule deals with'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.attribute IS 'The attribute of the subordinate coordinate kind this rule deals with'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.attribute_relationship IS 'The relationship between this attribute of the query coordinate and those satisfying the query'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.notes IS 'Usage notes for this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.research IS 'A research flag that has been set on an individual rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.updated_by IS 'The Resource that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_relationship.update_date IS 'The time at which this rule was last updated';
